column4: I remember once seeing a applet for gnome-panel that was basically an input box, where you could type a shell command and it would be run. Does anyone know where I can find something like that?
In dapper, you can add a "Run Application" thingy.  But I seem to recall reading that it was taken out of edgy?
that's probably what I was thinking of, but I cant find it, any clue where to get it from?
No clue.  I am using dapper.
